items.text: well outside off now, uses the angle and the batsman lets it go easily
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: oh that's the biggest wide of the over, and the morning, swinging further away from the batsman after pitching
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: and he's taken a wicket after all those wides! No dangerous pace, hardly any movement - just enough with the angle - but it's the accuracy outside off that tempts Soumya to drive. And as he does, the ball takes a thick outside edge to fly to Taylor at wide slip
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Soumya Sarkar, OUT

dismissal.text: Soumya Sarkar c Taylor b de Grandhomme 22 (41m 23b 3x4 0x6) SR: 95.65

items.preText: Five deliveries bowled so far in the over, only two counted, three runs and a wicket. Here's Mohammad Mithun and two slips for him. They're so close they could hold hands
items.text: oh my, a wide for a right-hander too. This one well outside off and swinging away too
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: better line now, outside the off stump with some shape and left alone
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: fifth wide of the over! Down the right-hander's leg side this time, might have been a sound there but the umpire doesn't think so
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: this one stays just inside the wide line on the off side despite the swing, legitimate delivery number four of the over
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: too wide and short, hardly any pace and Mithun stays on the back foot to punch that with some power through the covers for four
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: first ball of the over on the stumps, Mithun pushes it down towards mid-on
items.postText: What an eventful over that - 11 balls, a wicket, five wides and a four. Phew!
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: Lockie Ferguson with his express pace now and a slip
items.text: 143kmh, full outside off and a nice, late drive to beat Neesham at short point. Driven quite square of the wicket and he gets three for that
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, 3 runs

items.text: angling in from just outside off, defended into the covers for one
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: angling in sharply into Mushfiqur this time, it went off the thigh pad towards off and the batsman had no idea where that went
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: dropped at first slip by Taylor! That was just a straightforward catch, it's hard to believe Taylor put it down. Teasing line outside off, he drove away from the body for a thick edge and it went towards Taylor's right where he got both hands easily but it didn't stick in
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: a short ball down the leg side but not given a wide. Was probably just over the batsman, but close call
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: that is way too wide down the leg side, it even misses the keeper and has gone to the boundary
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 5 wides
Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: nice outswing but it's too full outside off and he does well to go down on a knee and drive it nicely square of the wicket in the gap for four
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: better length and closer to the stumps, he stays back and defends
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 123.6kmh, on the stumps again and on good length, solid straight bat stuff from Mushfiqur
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: away swing, wayward line and it's well outside the line for another wide
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

items.text: outswing again and I think it was just outside the wide line but he got away with it
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: oh this one shapes in after pitching outside off, short of length, and Mushfiqur watches it go
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back to his outswing now, it's inside the wide line so that's the end of the over
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: dropped by Taylor at slip again! What's going on?! Just back of length outside off and Mithun pokes at it, gets a thick outside edge and it should be a regulation slip catch. But Taylor goes to his left, gets both hands again around knee height, and he juggles yet again to spill it
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: off the middle off the bat this time outside off for a single towards cover point
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run
